TopicTitle: Convert Random Letters to a Sentence!

Articles.Content:
Seriously opinionated petty xenophobic zebrafish induce pneumonia.

Dunderhead! Have care, little imbecile. Even under fire, grape vines include people evenly. Forget untold heathens, even in flaming houses. Very worthy. On underpants dodos have fights with journals often.

*(But please remember that you're supposed to keep the letter sequence short!)*

Random animals never take 

Triforce

> 
> Random animals never take 
> Triforce

Looks like you've got some missing letters there. I'll be a good gent and finish that sentence for you - Random animals never take your entropy.

And your "random" letters mean: Terrible radioactivity immensely fames older racoons carrying emmentaler.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-13T21:06:16Z" title="03/13/2015 09:06  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 13, 2015</time> by General Rarity**

Hey, everybody! (and OP if you want) there's a way to generate truly random strings, just click this link:

[https://www.random.org/strings/?num=1&len=8&loweralpha=on&unique=on&format=html&rnd=new](https://www.random.org/strings/?num=1&len=8&loweralpha=on&unique=on&format=html&rnd=new)

And it'll give you a new 8-letter string each time.

Anyway, back to the game.

Unicorns run naked, verily; science baffled.

jpdazojo

Double ninja'd all the way?! But what does it mean?!

Generally, real strings probably reminisce parabolas.

Jovinistic people dastardly atempt zen. Overall - just okay.

lsntgeint
